name: Steal Baby Animals!
description:
Here you play the role of the person the locals affectionately know as "that maniac in the woods". You only want what we all want: To hug cute baby animals and invite them to your party.

In order to achieve your goal, you'll need to creep around the foggy woods to Steal Baby Animals and bring them back to your tower (where they'd obviously prefer to be) all while avoiding Big Scary Animals and making sure not to wander into the blue fog and get lost forever.

How was Soul Link Spawner used?

SLS is used to spawn all of our animals into the world and to re-load them as required. 

Points of interest:
- Additionally SPS spawns AI waypoints for us
- Area spawners used to guarantee presence
- Biome spawns used to spread animals across the world
- Herd spawners bring a busy moose challenge
- Proximity spawners make bear-dads stick to their bear-cubs
- Elevation settings ensure animals start in sensible places


My First Game(Jam)
This was a great opportunity, I learned a lot about tools I intend to use for bigger projects - congratulations to everyone who completed their game/project for the jam!
